text: I've been really happy since the day we met again 😌
There are many things I value in you...
Your wiseness, your kindness, your badass and very cute style 🥰
And above everything this connection we have, those honest and empathetic conversations.
They make us a beautiful and strong couple ❤️
I want to be there for you, support you all the way
And this is the meaning of that little surprise I have for you...
Open the package 😉📦 and swipe for more 👉
It is Myoovi, a period cramps relief device 🩵 (looks like it works pretty well!)
And here is how it works 🤓
I hope it will help you every time you experience those belly hard time 🤍
And for any other hard time, leave it to me 😘❤️
